parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The misalignment of the front axle can cause uneven tire wear, reduced traction, and loss of control, leading to accidents and potentially fatal consequences.
symptoms: The front axle tilts or leans to one side
reducing the amount of tread available for making turns
uneven tire wear
vibration
wobbling
and drifting off center at moderate speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front wheel bearings can cause the wheel to lock up, leading to loss of control and accidents.
symptoms: Noise
bearing lock-up
wheel dragging
and vibration.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Tread Loss and Frame Scraping
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive wear of tire tread can cause the tire to scrape against the vehicle's frame, leading to vibrations, loss of control, and potentially, accidents.
symptoms: The tire tread wears down excessively
the tire scrapes against the frame
the vehicle shakes violently while driving
the tire failure recurs despite replacement.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Tire Replacement and Manufacturer Response
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the manufacturer and dealer to address the recurring tire failure can lead to continued safety risks and financial burdens for the vehicle owner.
symptoms: The dealer and manufacturer deny assistance with the failure
the tire failure recurs despite replacement
the owner is left with the financial burden of repeated repairs.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front end wobble can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially lead to serious injuries or fatalities, especially at higher speeds.
symptoms: The front end of the vehicle wobbles when the driver loosens their grip on the handlebar
particularly at speeds between 30-55 mph
worsens on deceleration
and becomes more drastic the longer the grip is loose.
